com.k2.Proforma

Class ProformaOutput<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Expressions.evaluators.SimpleParameterEvaluator
      • com.k2.Expressions.evaluators.GenericEvaluator<E>
        • com.k2.Expressions.evaluators.ParamterOrObjectEvaluator<E>
          • com.k2.Proforma.ProformaOutput<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of the object that can be set on the proforma output to provide values for the proforma's parameters.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.k2.Expressions.Evaluator, com.k2.Expressions.GetterEvaluator<E>, com.k2.Expressions.ParameterEvaluator

    public class ProformaOutput<E>
extends com.k2.Expressions.evaluators.ParamterOrObjectEvaluator<E>
implements com.k2.Expressions.ParameterEvaluator
    The proforma output is an implementation of the ParamterEvaluator interface and as such can provide values for the parameters in a proforma. This class extends the ParramterOrObjectEvaluator consequently the set values for parameters will take precedence over values extracted from the object that the proforma output has been set to get it's value from by calling the with(...) method. Profoma output are created automatically when any of the methods of the proforma are called that set the output parameters of the proforma
    Author:
    simon

        Create a proforma output for the given proforma with the given collection of value sources. When such a proforma is output the output will be repeated for each object in the collection
        Parameters:
        proforma - The proforma defining the format of the output
        valueSources - A collection of objects to use a sources of values for the proforma
